resources.string: ADB डिवाइस की प्रतीक्षा की जा रही है।
Use an OTG cable and USB debugging to execute ADB commands on another Android device. You need to turn on USB Debugging in the developer settings of the target device.
Connect devices (Android 11+) over Wi-Fi using wireless debugging and execute ADB commands remotely.
You are using the latest version
OLED स्क्रीन वाले डिवाइस के लिए काला पेयशील थीम।
aShell You आपकी सभी ADB आवश्यकताओं के लिए यहाँ है।
ऐप अपडेट किया गया है, क्या आप जानना चाहेंगे कि क्या बदला है?
aShell You अभी भी काम कर रहा है। नए कमांड को चलाने के लिए कृपया इंतजार करें या मैन्युअल रूप से रोकें (स्टॉप बटन पर क्लिक करके)।
Are you sure you want to continue?
यह सुविधा वर्तमान में परीक्षण अवस्था में है। यदि आपको कोई समस्या आती है, कृपया डेवलपर को सूचित करें।
पसंदीदा की अधिकतम सीमा पहुंच गई है! नए जोड़ने के लिए कुछ पुराने पसंदीदा हटा दें
क्या आप सभी को साफ़ करना चाहते हैं?
क्लिपबोर्ड में कोई पाठ नहीं है
Selected %d items will be added to bookmarks
Selected %d items will be removed from bookmarks
Warning ! This action is irreversible\nAre you sure you want to delete all bookmarks?
All unpinned commands will be pinned\nDo you wish to continue?
\[%s\] will be pinned\nDo you wish to continue?
Do you want to unpin the selected commands?
\[%s\] will be unpinned\nDo you wish to continue?
लक्षित डिवाइस में अनुमति की पुष्टि करें
ऐप के लिए डिफ़ॉल्ट भाषा चुनें
This app allows you to execute ADB (Android Debug Bridge) commands directly on your device without needing a PC. Please read the following carefully before using the app:
While root access is not mandatory, certain commands may require elevated permissions. Misuse of ADB commands can lead to data loss, app crashes, or unexpected system behavior.
This app is designed for users who have a basic understanding of ADB commands. If you are unsure about a command’s effect, research it before executing it.
This app may require special permissions to function properly. It does not collect or share personal data, but users should be aware of the implications of granting ADB-related permissions.
By using this app, you acknowledge and agree to these terms. If you do not accept these conditions, please refrain from using the app.
Automatically set the app theme according to the device wallpaper
कुंजी का निर्माण और सहेजने में विफल
You\'re about to download updates directly from GitHub. Unlike updates from app stores, these are not reviewed for security. Do you want to continue?
If the permission dialog doesn\'t appear, please grant root permission manually via the superuser application
Execute ADB commands directly on your device using Shizuku or root. Manage apps, control system settings, and perform advanced debugging—all without needing a PC.
No application found to perform the task
आपके खोज के साथ कोई कमांड नहीं मिला
No devices has been connected yet! Connect a device to proceed
To complete the pairing process you will need to interact with a notification from aShell You. Please allow notification access to aShell You.

If you cannot enter the Pairing Code from the notification, then you might need to change the Notification Shade to Android. Go to Notification Settings ~ Notification Style to change the Notification Style. Otherwise you might not be able to enter the pairing code from the notification.
डिवाइस सही ढंग से कनेक्ट नहीं है। OTG के माध्यम से डिवाइस को सही ढंग से कनेक्ट करें और पुनः प्रयास करें
You will receive a notification from aShell You to help you with pairing
बाहर निकलने के लिए फिर से पीछे दबाएं
aShell You अभी भी काम कर रहा है। क्या आप वर्तमान प्रक्रिया को रोकना चाहते हैं?
क्या आप ऐप को बंद करना चाहते हैं?
Root access is currently denied for aShell You
Device might not be rooted or root presence might be hidden from aShell You
You are about to execute ADB commands involving critical system packages. Modifying, disabling, or uninstalling these packages may cause serious issues, including:
⚠️ System crashes or boot loops ⚠️ Loss of essential features (e.g., UI, network, security) ⚠️ Permanent damage requiring a factory reset or firmware reinstallation
If you are unsure about the impact, DO NOT PROCEED unless you have a full backup and know how to recover your device.
यदि सक्षम किया गया है, तो किसी भी पाठ को aShell You को साझा करने पर, ऑटोमेटिक रूप से ऐप प्राचल के रूप में पाठ को एक कमांड के रूप में चलाने का प्रयास करेगा
अंतिम कमांड का आउटपुट सहेजा नहीं गया था
अंतिम कमांड का आउटपुट \'%s\' फ़ोल्डर में निर्यात किया गया था
The shell output is exported to \'%s\' folder
शिझुकु सेवा तक पहुंच aShell You को अस्वीकार किया गया। यह ऐप एक उचित शिझुकु वातावरण के बिना काम नहीं करेगा।
शिझुकु अभी तक स्थापित नहीं है या आपकी डिवाइस पर सही ढंग से निर्धारित नहीं है। aShell You एक उचित शिझुकु वातावरण के बिना काम नहीं करेगा।
Like what I do?\nConsider buying me a coffee !
aShell You रूट संबंधित उपयोग के लिए डिज़ाइन नहीं किया गया था। बंद करें।
Turn off Mobile Data if the Wifi connection has NO INTERNET
All info cards will be visible now
A newer version of aShell You is available !\nClick on Download button to get the new version from the repository
You need to turn on USB Debugging in the developer settings of the target device
डिवाइस के लिए प्रतीक्षा कर रहा है
Go to Developer options > Wireless Debugging. Tap on Pair device with Pairing Code.
Come back to the app and click on the \"Start\" button in the home screen.
Please note that the left part of the Wireless Debugging option is clickable. Tapping on it will open the Wireless Debugging Pairing menu.
Select a target device to continue
To use the Wireless Debugging feature, your device must be connected to a Wi-Fi network. If your Wi-Fi connection has no Internet access then turn off mobile data for a solid Wi-Fi connection.
Choose a preffered mode for executing shell commands on your device
Choose what portion of the shell output should be saved
जब ऊपर या नीचे की तीर को क्लिक किया जाता है, तो शैल के आउटपुट में मुलायम स्क्रोलिंग की अनुमति देता है
शैल का आउटपुट साफ करने से पहले पूछें
यदि सक्षम किया गया है, तो \"स्क्रीन साफ़ करें\" बटन पर क्लिक करने के बाद एक पुष्टि पॉप-अप प्रदर्शित किया जाएगा।
Automatically checks for available newer versions when the app launches
पसंदीदा की अधिकतम सीमा को अधिलेखित करें
यदि बड़ी संख्या में बुकमार्क जोड़े जाएंगे तो यह धीमा कर सकता है! लो एंड उपकरणों को इस विकल्प को अक्षम रखना चाहिए
जब आप बाहरी कीबोर्ड का उपयोग करना चाहते हैं तो उपयोगी होता है
कुछ कमांड के उदाहरणों का संग्रह
All information cards will be visible again
एप्लिकेशन में किए गए सभी परिवर्तनों का इतिहास
केवल एक आदमी जो ऐप्स और डिज़ाइन का आनंद लेता है
Shizuku डेवलपर\naShell You की प्रमुख सुविधाओं का प्रदानकर्ता
aShell डेवलपर\nउनके बिना aShell You मौजूद नहीं होता
ADB⚡OTG डेवलपर\nधन्यवाद इनके लिए कि उन्होंने aShell You में OTG सुविधा को लागू किया
वेबसाइट डेवलपर, परीक्षक, चैनल प्रबंधक और बहुत कुछ\n\nतुम्हारा समर्थन के लिए धन्यवाद मित्र 🤗
Android & Backend developer\nHe is a highly skilled professional who has made significant contributions to the app\'s UI and UX design
Iconify डेवलपर\nने मुझे aShell You में समस्याओं को सही करने में मदद की 🤝
एक स्वतंत्र अनुवादक जिन्होंने ब्राजील के लिए अनुवाद किया
चीनी के लिए अनुवाद करने वाले व्यक्ति
Turkese translations are done by him
एप्लिकेशन का उपयोग करते समय किसी भी समस्या की सूचना दें
यदि आपके पास कोई विचार या सुझाव हैं, तो मुझे बताएं
aShell You का गिटहब रिपॉजिटरी पर जाएं
चर्चा के लिए टेलीग्राम चैनल में शामिल हों
Learn about the license this app is using
Use root access to run commands. Rooted commands can be executed.
Use shizuku to run commands. Commands that require root won\'t execute.
No higher privelege is granted. App will only execute basic commands. You can change the working mode later in settings
Choose the preferred layout style to view command examples
Choose a directory to save the shell output
Running ADB commands can modify system settings, manage files, and perform operations that may affect your device’s stability. You are solely responsible for any changes made using this app.
Root is not Mandatory, but Caution Needed

The developer(s) of this app are not responsible for any damage, data loss, or unintended consequences resulting from the use of this app. Proceed with caution and ensure you understand the commands you execute.
Enter the six digit Pairing Code into the notification sent by aShell You.
\n\n• Fixed the issue which caused per app translations to be broken for aShell You

• Adapted Github Actions for release builds.

• What this means for you?
• All subsequent builds including this will be more secure!

• Added WIRELESS DEBUGGING mode for running ADB commands on both own or other device

• Redesigned homepage for minimal navigation and less cluttery input field screen

• Added Warning feedback when executing commands involving critical system packages

• Added in-app updater. Now you can directly download the latest package without visiting Github repository

• Fixed a lot of bugs

• Huge UI and UX improvements across all sections of the app

• Added ROOT and BASIC shell in addition to Shizuku shell for running commands

• Added option to save output in custom directory

• Fixed a lot of bugs and issues

• Optimised app's code for better performance and stability

• Added vibration for haptic feedback

• Added option to change app language from within the app (for devices running Android 13 and above only and excluding unsupported devices)

• Fixed some crashes and improved crash reporting

• Minor UI improvements
\n\n• Now app catches any crashes and provides the option to report them via email

• Added option to open saved output directly

• Added option to save whole output or the last command output only

• Fixed crashes

• Fixed an issue with Sharing text to aShell You where the text did not appear when app was starting fresh

• Fixed minor UI issues

• Stable release of OTG mode

• Added features like save, share, quick scroll buttons to the OTG mode

• Added info cards for quick information

• Added in app update checker along with the option to auto check for updates

• Minor UI improvements

• Fixed some issues in OTG adb support

• Updated translations

• Updated dependencies

• Added more command examples
\n\n• Fixed AMOLED theme not working on devices running Android 11 or below

• Now you can Pin commands for quick access

 • Bug fixes and lot of code optimisations

• Now you can directly use commands from the Commands section instead of the need to copy them every time

 • Added option to delete all bookmarks

• In search : You can now search in commands summary by clicking a prompt chip

• Added sorting options in Commands templates

• Added option to directly bookmark selected items in Commands section

• Chip Indicator shows connected device(currently only in local ADB mode)

• Fixed bugs causing crashes in devices running Android 11 or below

• Added Turkish translation

• Minor UI improvements

• Lot of other bug fixes

• Added total bookmarks count

• Fixed some bugs

• Added Search in commands section

• Added option to set default working mode

• Improved animations

• Reworked bookmarks section and added sorting options

• Increased bookmarks limit to 25

• Removed ADB shell launcher shortcut and added Commands launcher shortcut

• Fixed padding issues in button navigation

• Fixed some buttons shape

• App uses a more refreshed color palette for material you themeing

• Fixed minor bugs
\n\n• Fixed some crashes that were introduced in v3.8.0

• Added black (amoled) theme

• Added undo button to undo paste

• Added option to disable soft keyboard

• Fixed buttons stretched in some screen sizes

• Fixed bookmarks button not appearing after opening the app

• Renamed Examples section to Commands

• Fixed copy command option not appearing for every command template

• App now uses system font everywhere

• Improved UI handling

• Updated translations

• Now you can share texts from anywhere on your device to aShell You and run commands directly.

• Now you can share shell output directly without needing to save it !

• A lot of optimisations and UI handling.

• Added Chinese translations.

• Updated translations.

• Added option to clear the command input field after an error

• Fixed a bug which caused the app to crash upon pasting from clipboard under certain conditions

• Code optimisations
\n\n• Fixed some issues with bottom navigation.

• Revamped About section of the app.

• Added launcher shortcuts.

• Fixed navigation menu not showing in button navigation.

• Improved bottom navigation menu visibility on scrolling.

• Added per app language support for aShell You (translations aren't completed yet).

• A lot of code optimisations.

• Added a Paste button so that you can copy and paste commands quickly.

• Added Error indicators in the text input field.

• Improved Navigation Bar visibility logic.

• Fixed an issue where switches misbehaves under certain situations.

• Fixed add bookmark icon visibility in various contrast levels.

• A lot of code optimisation. App now opens a lot faster than before.

• App will stay in background and won't restart every time you close the app by just pressing the back button or gesture.

• Added bookmarks , history and command suggestions to OTG

• Added maximum bookmarks limit.

• Added option to override maximum bookmarks limit.

• A lot of bug fixes.

• Improved some UI handling.

• A lot of code optimisation.

• A lot of UI related improvements.

• Added chips that indicate current ADB working mode.

• A lot of code optimisation.

• Improvements to ADB OTG after initial release.

• Some UI and logic adjustments to accomodate the new otg feature.

• Added ADB THROUGH OTG support.

 *** You will be able to run ADB commands on other devices using aShellYou by connecting the other device using an OTG cable ***

• Removed unnecessary code and resources.

• Minor UI changes.

• Removed unnecessary code and resources.

• Minor UI changes.

• Changed app name to aShell You.

• Added predictive back animations for supporting devices.

• Added confirmation dialog popup before clearing screen.

• Fixed StatusBar elements not properly visible in Light mode.

• App is much more smooth now.
 ~ Reduced app size and optimised code.

• Added themed icon for launchers that support themed icons.

• Minor UI changes.

• Revamped Settings panel.

• Added Double Tap to instant scroll to top and bottom positions in shell output view.

• Minor UI fixes.

• Added Settings panel.

• Added option to disable smooth scroll in shell output.

• Fixed major bugs:

 ~ Crash while changing device theme.

 ~ Crash while trying to save large shell output . eg : output of 'pm' command.

• Replaced some deprecated api.

• Minor UI changes.

• Added Scroll To Top and Scroll To Bottom buttons.

• Added Click keyboard Enter key to Send command.

• Added some commands.

• Updated dependencies to include latest material you library.

• Minor UI changes.

• Added some more command examples.

• Minor UI changes.

• Changed package name to avoid version confusion with original app.

• Added changelogs into the app.

• Added highlighted shell output.

• Minor UI changes.

• Added dynamic material theming.

• Revamped whole UI to give a fresh look.
